alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 11:57AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Morrow and central Umatilla Counties through 1230 PM PDT... At 1156 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles east of Heppner, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pendleton, Cayuse, Umatilla Reservation and Mission. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
